text: Sean Griffiths (born 16 May 1995) is a Welsh first-class cricketer. He is a right-handed batsman and a right-arm medium fast bowler. He made his first- class debut Cardiff MCCU against Glamorgan on 1 April 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh cricketers Category:Cardiff MCCU cricketers Category:Wales Minor Counties cricketers
title: Sean Griffiths
